test_description: Verify automated service center assignment based on geospatial polygon containment
business_risk: Critical - Failure leads to unassigned tickets and SLA breaches
preconditions: PostGIS database seeded with Service Center polygons; Redis round-robin counters initialized
test_steps: 1. Create Service Request with lat/long coordinates inside Polygon A; 2. Trigger routing logic; 3. Verify Service Center A is assigned; 4. Create second request in overlapping Polygon A/B region; 5. Verify round-robin assignment to Service Center B
expected_result: Request routed to correct center using ST_Contains; Overlaps handled via Redis counter
test_data_needs: GeoJSON polygons; User address coordinates; Service Center profiles
environment_requirements: Integration Env with geospatial data support
data_setup_complexity: High - Requires complex spatial data seeding
cleanup_requirements: Truncate service requests; Reset Redis keys

test_description: Verify offline queue synchronization when network connectivity restores
business_risk: High - Data loss leads to incomplete service records
preconditions: Technician logged in; Local WatermelonDB initialized; Device offline
test_steps: 1. Disable network; 2. Complete job (signature + notes); 3. Verify local persistence; 4. Enable network; 5. Verify background sync triggers; 6. Confirm data present in Backend DB
expected_result: Local actions queued and successfully synced without conflict upon reconnection
test_data_needs: Assigned Job ID; Base64 Signature Image
success_criteria: Zero data loss; Sync completes < 30s after reconnect
cleanup_requirements: Wipe local DB; Reset backend job status
accessibility_requirements: Offline indicator visible to screen readers
